scripts.test:pre: yarn test:pre:nobuild && echo "Build backend" && yarn build:backend && echo "Build frontend" && yarn build:frontend && echo "Build scratch" && yarn build:scratch
scripts.test: yarn test:pre && COVERAGE=true dotenv -- playwright test && yarn test:report-coverage
scripts.test:nobuild: yarn test:pre:nobuild && COVERAGE=true dotenv -- playwright test && yarn test:report-coverage
scripts.test:debug: COVERAGE=true DEBUG=true dotenv -- playwright test --debug --project='iPad Mini landscape'
scripts.test:debug:skip-setup: COVERAGE=true SKIP_SETUP=true DEBUG=true dotenv -- playwright test --debug --project='iPad Mini landscape'
